snippet: The tugboat, which sank after radioing for help on Saturday afternoon, had been doing work on the eastern tip of Long Island, the Coast Guard said.
abstract: Man dies when tugboat sinks off coast of Fire Island, while three survivors are treated for hypothermia and brought to hospital.
lead_paragraph: The tugboat, which sank after radioing for help on Saturday afternoon, had been doing work on the eastern tip of Long Island, the Coast Guard said.

headline.main: One Dies and Three Are Rescued After Tugboat Sinks Near Fire Island
headline.print_headline: Boat Sinks Near Fire Island; One Dies, and 3 Are Rescued
